timeline.bodyText: Well I think you fixed it but now if you click the back button after the search it showroom is empty. That is why this code existed. Maybe easier would be check if state is uninitialized on back button click and call loadShowRoom then
timeline.author: 1-alex98

replies.bodyText: I don't get this error the show room always populates for me with the back button. How are you getting an empty showroom?
